title: Advancements in MAX phase materials: structure, properties, and novel applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26995-27041
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03714F, Review Article

Md. Shahinoor Alam, Mohammad Asaduzzaman Chowdhury, Tasmina Khandaker, Muhammad Sarwar Hossain, Md. Saiful Islam, Md. Moynul Islam, Md. Kamrul Hasan
The MAX phase represents a diverse class of nanolaminate materials with intriguing properties that have received incredible global research attention because they bridge the divide separating metals and ceramics.
